1.0.name: wordpress/bumpin-twitter
1.0.description:
BumpIn Twitter Connect plugin lets your visitors view your tweets and tweets made about you without leaving the site. Twitter widget fully integrates your twitter accuont with your website/blog. It not only increases your followers on twitter but also the time spent by the visitors on your site and dcreases the bounce rate. Following is the list of features of the plugin.

Users can follow you in just one click without leaving your website.

Live twitter stream from your twitter account.

Separate section for Tweets about you.

Users can tweet about the article/page through an automatically filled text form.

Number of followers.

Users can follow you on twitter.

Search Tweets without leaving the site.
